creator: liu.xp2003@gmail.com
text:
Currently, The Synchronizing Timer feature could sync all thread in one JMeter client or JMeter server.

Could JMeter client sync all JMeter server's threads at same test sampler in script?
It could help me run large concurrent test with scalable JMeter server.
It could help me run some test steps at same start time with JMeter servers.
